body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Mark Roberts and the customer's name is Megan Watson.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Mark Roberts, and I'm with Bright Accounting Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Mark. I'm Megan Watson, and I'm calling about my recent bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Megan. I understand that billing concerns can be tricky. Can you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is four five six seven two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Megan. I appreciate your cooperation. Can you also share your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it is April fifth, nineteen eighty-eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Let me pull up your account and check the details regarding your bill.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Okay, I hope there’s no mistake. I’m feeling a bit anxious about the charge.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Megan. Finding the right information is essential. I will do my best to resolve this for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Mark.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today, Megan. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
